client

接口 KVCommInterface

  • 所有已知实现类：
    KVStore

    public interface KVCommInterface

    • 方法摘要

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and 描述
      void connect()
      Establishes a connection to the KV Server.
      void disconnect()
      disconnects the client from the currently connected server.
      KVMessage get(java.lang.String key)
      Retrieves the value for a given key from the KVServer.
      java.lang.String help() 
      boolean isConnected() 
      KVMessage put(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Inserts a key-value pair into the KVServer.
      void quit() 

    • 方法详细信息

      • connect

        void connect()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Establishes a connection to the KV Server.
        抛出：
        java.lang.Exception - if connection could not be established.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        返回：
        抛出：
        java.lang.Exception

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        disconnects the client from the currently connected server.
        抛出：
        java.lang.Exception

      • put

        KVMessage put(java.lang.String key,
            java.lang.String value)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Inserts a key-value pair into the KVServer.
        参数：
        key - the key that identifies the given value.
        value - the value that is indexed by the given key.
        返回：
        a message that confirms the insertion of the tuple or an error.
        抛出：
        java.lang.Exception - if put command cannot be executed (e.g. not connected to any KV server).

      • get

        KVMessage get(java.lang.String key)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves the value for a given key from the KVServer.
        参数：
        key - the key that identifies the value.
        返回：
        the value, which is indexed by the given key.
        抛出：
        java.lang.Exception - if put command cannot be executed (e.g. not connected to any KV server).

      • quit

        void quit()
          throws java.io.IOException
        抛出：
        java.io.IOException

      • help

        java.lang.String help()
        返回：
